trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Kingman
There were no other sightings in Kingman on or around December 20th 2007
divs: sighting detailsi dana hoecker after accepting in my life the true path to god i had been driving west on route 66 in kingman az at 606 pm at mile marker 66.yes i was on a 6 quest,i have notes to show my studies searching for the reality of religion when i confessed my sins in full while driving and suddenly i was not in my body or in my truck for that matter,i was in a huge valley,not one manmade item was in view,the sky was literally ripped away,stars and houses and all were gone,vanished and instead i viewed a pedistal or pillar in the front of me and on the pillar was a sphere,round ,white with green lines on it,like marble swirl.a cable or rope was attached to the pillar i beleive on the left side,i at first thought i was seeing a life form and it was its arm but i changed my mind on this idea as the cable extended into this huge valley straight down the center forever it appeared.the valley was huge ,dark as night on the left and brilliant and clouds were on the right .the light was in the clouds to the right,purple and blues and bright,brillianty bright.i had scarcely time to take it in when i become a driver of my truck again,i was not even a hundred feet from my spot on the highway where this started.i almost crashed as my knees were shaking so bad .i could only ask out loud what does this mean?in my mind i felt these words come to me,you are to be the messiah and earth will be saved.a sudden euphoria came over me ,still existing to this day.well next thing i know i have extreme thinking and can figure stuff out i know nothing about.the sealed text of daniel`s day was given to me,i found the text hid away in the bible,i had an experience where i said i dont understand what i have found and i was downloaded with piles of information so fast i screamed for it to stop.secrets of eternity,i cant comprehend most of it but i did pull the text from the bible and i have proof beyond compare the story i read is mans last message we will receive to not kill ourselves.the reality is all space is rearranging itself and our past man knew whats going on.the alignment of planets,the apophis asteriod.our fate is in a book,as hard as this is to swallow,i saw the ship coming to help us.this happened about the past month.i have a drawing of it dated but i do not have my notes here now.it was the same craft i saw as a child,after the nuclear bomb test in colorado.late 60`s early 70`s.like a huge habittrail in the sky,the center craft was covered in added on spheres all over hanging down ,pointing up,like the jetsons structures.i feel like i have an open link to this object.i even started a model to show how it looked.i have awesome powers of the mind and i fear i could do damage if i play around.this craft was seen looking west out my back window and i was terrified to my bones and immediately the craft dissappeared.this is not a ship but rather a city.as a child the very same vehicle i describe terrified me,i was in broomfield that time.the object left like this,up and out of view,just like my out of body experience.instant.my fear left immediately after it did and then i was calmed and i felt i was not quite ready.i had another experience following this as i tried to make sence of these things happening to me.i was again out of body and i was outside looking in to our galaxy i guess.there in a monolith of clear something was galaxies swirling slowly like soup being stirred and the spoon removed.i felt like 2001 space oddesy or something,it appeared we are in a penal colony earth type rectangle of matter.i feel now it was the sea of glass.i was on the outside looking at it.i looked away and it was the same everywhere i looked.open space for ever,systems of matter everywhere.we as man have never seen all our heavens from outside looking in.i have appeared to have made contact with other beings but i have seen them not.when i think to myself i get answere from something,not yes or no but the path to find answers.i have had words in my thoughts,like he`s ready ,download codes now and then i learn things i dont know.i took many notes on my experiences and how i applied it to the bible and now posess the playbook of the future.this is the only part i can prove.the timeline of my text is now 2008.it lists all the people in power or wanna be,i forgot ,i have a special item received after my contact.a rock,a special rock,pectrified wood,in and on it are things you cant dismiss as strange,i think it proves our existance.an eagle,snake,ape`s face,man`s face,fish,boat w\mast ;sail,spaceship,the rock shaped like a human hand,perfect in measurements,also looks like bone ,sinew and fat,then there is a pic,of a man in buckskins and above that is a shepherd with his kea.this seemed to be the reason i went to arizona,to recover this rosetta stone\ prophecy rock.i keep saying i have proofs with me.i seem to also have a link to some huge library of information,i can call upon.i wish you to prove me crazy or wake up and realize contact has been established through me somehow.my text should amaze you alone.these things have happened allready.ternazi assaniation attempt,tanazi nuke site,ww2 bomb in japan,hillary losing logo,volcano erupting and big earthquake(chili and minimar)there is more but even though i flubbed these reports up some none the less i reported them to fox news.they have no comment.the fbi refuses intel from b iblical sources even though they are tied so tight one cant exist without the other.i will surrender proof after you read this and want to believe.i have told lots of parties,un,usa,moscow,saigon,ect...o reply. no beleivers to my story so i hope you feel this is genuine.i cant make this up and all my accounts differ very little. you may have anyone contact me as there is more to this story than this,i have an indian rug that has my full legal name and social security in it.i am the man who was suppose to get the real story out.on my honor this is a true account of the events happening to me,dana rene hoecker.6-7-2008 please dont hesitate to contact me.this is upmost important to mankind.peace.
Summary: traveled to elsewhere in spirit? saw amazing things.
